locations.Name: ACMI
locations.Description: Noteworthy institution celebrating film, television and gaming with exhibits, screenings and events.

locations.Name: St Paul's Cathedral
locations.Description: Neo-Gothic cathedral, consecrated in 1891, with twin spires and stained-glass processional door.

locations.Name: Federation Square
locations.Description: Abstract buildings flank this block-size plaza, filled with restaurants, museums and arts venues.

locations.Name: Royal Botanic Gardens
locations.Description: 36-hectare botanic garden founded in 1846, planted with Australian species and non-native gardens.
